Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_MAIN_0_VOLUME_0010.Text: *: You there!
*: Sorry for stopping you out of the blue. You're not from here, are you?
*: I thought as much. Listen, our king is not as he once was. It is dangerous to even enter the castelo.
*: He has punished many an innocent man for crimes they did not commit. I do not wish for you to befall the same fate.
*: ...You see, my papai, Simão, was one of the king's victims. Ten years ago he was charged with treason and locked away.
*: The king used to be known for his generosity and understanding.
*: But then one day he became the brute that rules us now.
*: Therefore, I think it's best you avoid the castelo at all costs. You can never be too careful.
*: Olá! We meet again!
*: I actually have something I wanted to show you.
*: I found it when I was tidying up the house; it's my father's diary.
*: It could help with finding my dear papai, so I thought you should see it too.
{HERO} takes a look at the diary.
It is filled with Simão's musings on life.
<6>I made a new friend today.
<6>He is stronger than most and seems a seasoned adventurer. We exchanged thoughts on the increase in monster activity of late.<9>
<6>It appears I was correct. There is more than just one foe in our midst.
<6>I will need to be stronger to be up to the task. As strong as Ortega.<9>
<6>No matter how many we slay, the monsters do not cease their pursuit.
<6>It seems they are after Ortega and anyone who dares aid him.<9>
<6>I spoke with Ortega and the path became clear.
<6>I could not have asked for a better friend. His wisdom as a fellow warrior and father is unmatched.
<6>For now, I will leave this land and wait for my moment. The Goddess will surely smile on us again.
<6>Just as she will smile upon our children for years to come thereafter. Though, it is a shame I will not be here to see it.<9>
*: I see... My father had already breathed his last within his prison walls.
*: I would be lying if I said I did not suspect it, but having it confirmed is...hard to accept.
*: At least his sword found its way to you and served its purpose.
*: You know, going through his diary made me realise something.
*: Now the real king has returned, and peace with him, I am certain my papai would want me to help protect Manoza.
*: And I know I can't disappoint him.
*: Just like the Mountaincleaver helped you find your path, I want to help someone else find theirs.
*: Oh, sorry. I'm sure you need to get going. I just wanted you to hear that.
*: Obrigado. Thank you for listening to me.
*: I know your journey is far from done, but I wish you the best. Do visit us again should your adventures allow it.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_0.Text: *: When is papai coming home? Where has he gone?
*: So, my papai, he... He died...?
*: One, two, one, two! Hup! Hup!
*: I must grow big and strong, so that I may protect Mamai in Papai's place.
*: This is why I must perform my exercises every single day. Hup! Hup!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_0.Text: *: Breno... Amigo... Why did this have to happen to such a good man as you...?
*: Olá! Welcome to the city of Manoza!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_0.Text: *: Iii... Goodness... To sentence a man to death merely for speaking ill of the king is...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_0.Text: *: O, wise and all-powerful Goddess, we commit to its resting place the body of your humble servant Breno...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_0.Text: *: Marido meu... My husband... Why did you have to die...? (sob) Ohhh, my dear husband... (sob)
*: Porquê...? Why...? Why did this have to happen to my poor, innocent husband...? (sob) Ohhhhhh...
*: Muito obrigada... Thank you so much, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>... Now, my marido, my dear husband, he can rest in (sniff) peace... Oh, husband! (sob)

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_0.Text: *: É terrível! It is terrible! Every day, more people are sent to jail or, worse, sentenced to death.
*: What has happened to our king? He was once such a kind man...
*: Peace has returned to our kingdom at last! Praise be to the Goddess!
*: Tranqüilidade has returned to the city. The people are happy once more.
*: Those times... The times of oppression... Now they seem little more than dreams...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_0.Text: *: The king, he sleeps alone upstairs in the castelo in the night-time.
*: Though he is within his fortress, to sleep without a guard nearby is to tempt fate, surely.
*: The king, he still sleeps alone upstairs in the castelo in the night-time. Will he never learn?

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910_0.Text: *: Hmm... The shopkeeper has left a note to say that he is at a funeral...
*: There are countless rumours concerning our king, you know.
*: I'm sure the townspeople will share them with you, but be careful you are not overheard by the king's men.
*: Caramba... The rumours really were true. But then where could my father be?
*: At any rate, I wish you the best on your travels. Do visit us again should your adventures allow it.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_0.Text: *: The funeral must still be going on down in the town...
*: This is the servants' entrance. Do you have some kind of business here, friend?
*: Then please, by all means, in you go.
*: Then please, I would ask that you announce yourself at the main entrance instead.
*: Friend! After what you have done for us, you need not sneak in by the servants' entrance!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_0.Text:
*: ♪ Ohhh, at last we are free both to dance and to sing...
To proclaim the return of our one rightful king! ♪

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1120_0.Text: *: (sniff) Ahh! Verily, the night air is a true tonic!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_0.Text:
*: ♪ La-la-laa, la-la-laa, lol-de-ree-ray,
Fal-da-raa, lal-da-raa daaay! ♪

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1210_0.Text: *: I am practising a dance to accompany the music of my friend here, the bard.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1310_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_0.Text: ...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1510_0.Text: *: I heard that an artefato mágico, a magical artefact, named Ra's Mirror lies in a cave to the south-east. Supposedly, it has the power to reveal something's true form...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1610_0.Text: *: You! What are you plotting? If you do not wish to end up in the jail, you will leave at once. Go on! Vaza!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Church_SUB_0_ACTOR_022.Text: *: I have known His Majesty the king since he was a little bebê, no bigger than my thumb...
*: That king of then, and this king of now<--->they are not the same person. It cannot be.
*: The king who now sits upon the throne<--->he is our true monarch. I, more than any other, should know.
*: Blessed Goddess... Santa Mãe... May peace be upon our kingdom now and for all time... (whisper whisper)

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House1_SUB_0_ACTOR_012.Text: *: Papai... Zzz... Oh, my dear papai...
*: Zzz... Mamai, I will look after you... I promise... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House1_SUB_0_ACTOR_022.Text: *: There are no words of consolation... Such saudade... Such terrible (sob) sadness... Ohhh... (sniff)

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House1_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: For me, the only pleasure in life now will be in making sure my beloved boy grows into a fine and healthy man.
*: Iii, I must begin cooking his dinner right away!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House2_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Iii, the Archfiend threatens our world, and this on top of everything else! I fear I am not much longer for this world...
*: Our true king is returned to us. Perhaps the end is not so close as I had feared...
*: His Majesty the king is now even more generous a ruler than he was before...the incident.
*: I will surely live another thousand years!
*: If you value your life, friend, you will not go near the castelo...
*: Perhaps our only hope is to leave this, our hometown, once and for all...
*: Obrigado. Thank you, stranger. Thanks to you, we will not be forced to leave our beloved homeland.
*: Peace has returned to our kingdom at last, but rumours of the Archfiend still abound. Perhaps this is not over yet...
*: It is you, stranger! Please, for all you have done for us, you must make yourself at home!
*: If I wish to escape the city and move elsewhere, I must take with me my dear vovô<--->my grandfather.
*: Alas, he will surely not survive the journey... Iii, what am I to do...?
*: If the Archfiend is not defeated, we will surely suffer further misfortunes.
*: Iii, I cannot help but worry for our future...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House2_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Ho ho ho! You have it all wrong, friend! Por favor<--->approach me from the other side.
*: I, too, have heard something of this mod rod...
*: I hear that it is a rarity, not sold in any normal shop such as my own...
*: I am sorry, but the shop is closed for today. Please, come back on the morrow.
*: So if you get 'old of that mod rod, word is, you can change yerself into anythin' you like. Fancy that, eh?

*: 'Ere, they're sayin' that fake king used that mod rod thingy to make 'imself look like the real deal! And there I was thinkin' His Majesty 'ad used it to turn 'imself into a nutter! So near and yet so far, eh?
*: It is I! The foolish hero whose thunder was stolen by your saving of the king!
*: I have decided to hang up my sword, and to sell weapons rather than swing them. Ehehehehe!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_House3_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: You didn't 'ear it from me, right, but I reckon the reason the king's gone all doolally is to do with that mod rod.
*: That's my theory, anyway. What d'you reckon? I could be onto sumfink, eh?
*: Thought you might say that. 'Ere<--->seein' as you listened to me 'are-brained theory, I'll tell you sumfink else...
*: If any of yer mates get sent flyin' over the 'orizon by a blast of Blasto, they'll come crawlin' back as soon as you've finished fightin'. Good to know, eh?
*: 'Course I was! I knew you'd say that!
*: By the way, there's some new city been built on the east coast up on the northern bit of this continent somewhere. You should go an' 'ave a butcher's!
*: It's nice the place is all peaceful again, but there ain't no bringin' back everyone 'oo died, is there?
*: That's why I'm gonna stay 'ere an' look after all their graves. Give 'em a bit of the respect they never 'ad in life, innit.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_1F_MAIN_0_SCENE.Text: Needless to say, I will be keeping a closer eye on my mod rod from now on...
My sincerest thanks for saving both me and my kingdom. We are all eternally in your debt.
And the more I dwell on it, the more I think it is for the best that I bestow my mod rod unto you.
May it aid you on your travels.
Oh, and I have also prepared another small token of my gratitude to you. Goddesspeed now, young adventurer.
*: The king said the reward is yours to take. The entire kingdom wishes you all the best on your journey.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: This is the cozinha of the castelo<--->the kitchen. If you have no business here, please, you are in the way.
*: Ah-phew... Eek! Majesty! Forgive me, I did not mean to... Ah-phew...
*: Mm nm nm nm...
*: Por favor<--->do not distract us. If his supper is late, we, too, will receive the death sentence...
*: Blessed Goddess... Santa Mãe... Thank you for allowing me to survive another day in this accursed place...
*: Praise be to the Holy Mother! No more must we dine on the wings of bats and the tails of lizards!
*: Mm nm nm nm...
*: Ooo, and what shall I cook today, hm?
*: Beef steak à moda do Manoza? Or perhaps my famous fish stew?
How could this happen to my dear papai, who was once so kind...?
It is not done for a princess to suspect that her father is no longer...her father, but...
Mm nm nm nm...
My true papai, my kind-hearted, warm and giving father<--->he is returned! Ooo, it is like a dream come true!
It is a fine thing indeed that peace has returned to the palace. Yet I cannot help but feel a little bored...
Caramba! What am I saying!? It is most ungrateful of me!
*: The king, he is the greatest man in all the world! Hee... Heeheehee. (gulp)
*: For our beloved king, we would do anything. Anything he might ask... Ehe... Ehehehe... (whimper)
*: I am the dancing girl who was imprisoned in the dungeon beneath. Obrigada. I owe you my life.
*: Ooo, the castelo in the evenings, it is so quiet... So...romantic...
*: Has the king summoned you here, stranger?
*: Liar! I have not been told of anyone of your...kind being expected. Now, vaza! Get out of here!
*: Then vaza! Get out of here! We do not allow people of your...kind to wander the castelo halls unsupervised.
*: Friend! It is you! Please, come inside!
*: Muito obrigado! Thank you! Thank you so very much!
*: Olá! Welcome to the castelo of Manoza.
*: His Majesty's bedchamber is through here. I doubt you have any business there, friend.
*: Que isso? What is this? How did you manage to get up there?
*: I will let you pass this once, but you must leave this place! Go on! Vaza!
*: I am certain that His Majesty has retired for the night. Please, you must not disturb him.
*: Ai, it is our hero! The returner to us of our true king! Obrigado, stranger! We are forever in your debt!
*: The rumours speak of an Archfiend poised to destroy our world...
*: Has our king perhaps sold his soul to this selfsame Archfiend in a bid to save us...? Iii, what am I saying!? Por favor<--->forget this thing I have said.
*: The world, it is a wondrous place indeed. Truly anything can happen...
*: Quem é você, uh? Who are you?
*: I must apologise for my rudeness to you. But you must understand, we were under great pressure...
*: Mm-nm-nmm... Zzz...
*: Mmm? Aiee! I cannot allow myself to fall asleep at my post! The king, he will...
*: I must not go without dinner again. This always happens when I go without dinner...
*: Mm-nm-nmm... Zzz...
*: Mmm? Aiee! You... You surprised me...
*: My dinner, it was too large, I think... I must learn to have portion control!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_1F_MAIN_0_VOLUM.Text: Grrr! Who you!? How you get in here!? King no like look of you!
Grrr! How you escape!? And why you stupid enough to come back?
Grrrarrrgh! Guards! Throw back in dungeon!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: I dared not hope that I would sit upon my throne again. You have my deepest thanks, {LEADER}.
Alas, the mod rod was purloined by monsters. How could we be so foolish as to let them take such a thing unchecked?
If only I had left it in the care of the sorcerer in Grimland, it never would have been stolen...
But this is not your concern. You may keep the rod. May it serve you better than it ever did me!
You know, there is a special prison that was once used to lock away Manoza's most dangerous criminals.
It had been forgotten for many moons till that impostor and his minions decided to use it again. For all we know, there could still be monsters lurking within!
Please, remember well what I have told you now, my friend. I do not want you to be unprepared.
Should you wish to visit the prison, you may access it by going to a church to the east of Manoza. There is a teleportal within which will lead you to a small island that contains the prison.
What? Your ship was pushed backwards when you tried to pass through a certain strait?
Hmm... My apologies, friend. I have no idea why that would be.
I am afraid you will have to try asking those who live near this strait. Perhaps they will know more than I do.
You know, there is a special prison that was once used to lock away Manoza's most dangerous criminals.
It had been forgotten for many moons till that impostor and his minions decided to use it again.
For all we know, there could still be monsters lurking within! Remember well what I have told you now, my friend. I do not want you to be unprepared should you go there.
Should you be inclined to visit the prison, go to a church to the east of Manoza. There is a teleportal within which will lead you to a small island that contains the prison.
Are you familiar with the desert kingdom of Ibis? I only mention it to bring your attention to an ancient kingdom to its south, surrounded by perilous peaks.
The Necrogond... In the distant past, we actually engaged in some dealings with them.
I suppose you must be wondering how to reach it, no? First, make landfall at the foot of the great volcano, then follow the path that weaves between the mountains.
However, if you must go there, remain vigilant! It is shrouded in mystery nowadays, and even the bravest adventurers do not dare explore the region.
All I can do now is pray that the Mountaincleaver serves you well on your quest. May the Goddess go with you, {LEADER}.

Welcome, {HERO}, welcome! You saved my life; I owe you a debt that can never be repaid!
Please, make yourself at home.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: I must send someone to take a look at whatever is wrong with the roof.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_2F_BedRoom_MAIN.Text: Grrrmmm... Who dare disturb royal slumber...? Come back...mmm...never...
Grrrmmm... Who dare disturb royal slumber...? Come back...mmm...never...
{LEADER} holds aloft Ra's Mirror, revealing the king's true form...
The king is actually a terrifying monster!
Heh heh! Well, you no live to tell! Heh heh! Grrrarrrgh!
But...no matter. You too weak for big boss Baramos... Like fly against lion...
So it became known that the heartless king of Manoza was in fact an impostor.
The real king and all those falsely imprisoned were promptly rescued from their cells in the dungeon.
Exhausted from the day's events, {HERO} decided to spend the night in the castle...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_B1_MAIN_0_SCENE.Text: *: And no talking! Cala a boca!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_B1_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: This is the dungeon of the castelo. You have no business here. Vaza! Begone!
*: Zzz! Zzz! I am sleeping! I hope I do not say anything which I will later regret! Zzz!
*: Zzz! The king, he has been acting very strangely lately. But we cannot defy the orders of our liege lord. Zzz! Zzz!
*: Snore! I hope that nobody capable of defying him happens to find the secret passage out of the dungeon! Zzz! Zzz!
*: Thanks to you, all those imprisoned in the dungeons have been released. You have done a truly great thing.
*: Since you saved our kingdom, the dungeons have been empty, and my days filled with peace. Obrigado, friend!
*: Greetings, friend! I am a wandering minstrel! ...Though I have not been wandering so much of late, for obvious reasons...

*: ♪ Ohhh, I hope and I pray that I do not periiish...
As did noble Simão whom many did cheriiish!
To the north and the east of fair Roma-ri-aaa... ♪

*: ♪ Was he sentenced to die in a place dank and dre-aaar... All alone on his own in a cell 'pon a laaake... Making many a misty-eyed maiden's heart breeeak! ♪
Oh... Oh, Goddess... Please don't let me die in here! (sob)
*: I just know that monsters have begun to take over our hearts<--->perhaps even our bodies... Ooo, it is terrifying!
*: All I did was mention Ra's Mirror, and the next thing I know I'm locked up in this blasted dungeon!

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_B2_A_SUB_0_ACTO.Text: Is there someone there? Can you hear me? I am the rightful king of this country...
That...thing stole from me my form... (cough cough) Please, put a stop to that accursed impostor...
Head to the cave... The one to the south-east... You must obtain the mirror within...

The mirror... (cough)
Use...on him...at night...
Zzz... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_B2_B_SUB_0_ACTO.Text: *: Stand aside! I must escape this place, and slay the impostor king!
*: Uh? The true king is returned, and all the prisoners freed? Hm.
*: Now I feel a little foolish...

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_Castle_DreamSpace_MAIN.Text: You have overcome another obstacle that would have bested most.
However, you must not grow complacent.
This is far from the last test you will face on your quest. Steel yourself for what lies ahead.
Someone aged and a magical staff.
The bones of the dead and a wandering vessel.
A sword of the earth and a mountain most fiery.

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: Olá! Welcome to the monster arena<--->the pride of Manoza!
*: Verme! Worm! He cannot fool the people!
*: He thinks that by building this den of vice, he will distract us from the terror of his reign!? Never!
*: Não, não! The imp will win!
*: Que? The imp was defeated in the last fight!
*: Hmm... Right, so with a team made up of these monsters, that's, er...let's see...a forty percent chance of winnin', so...
*: Leave us alone, will ya? I'm workin' out the odds 'ere.
*: Winnin' in the arena's all about weighin' up the odds, see? It's a science, ain't it?
*: Hmm... Right, so with a team made up of these monsters, that's, er...let's see...a forty percent chance of winnin', so...
*: Everyone seems to be usin' beasts and seafarin' monsters. They've got plenty o' stamina, so I'll wanna pack me team with monsters that can hit loads o' foes at once.
*: Hmm... Right, so with a team made up of these monsters, that's, er...let's see...a forty percent chance of winnin', so...
*: Everyone's loadin' their teams with monsters that can cast mighty spells. Best make sure some of me lads can use healing magic...
*: After all our hard work and especial training, I think we can do it...
*: But if we lose... Não, não, não... We can win<--->we will win!

*: ♪ How I long to peer behind the mask.
Off to the east as the sun sets at last.
Us two alone just what would I aaask... ♪

Txt_Talk_Samanosa_BattleRoad_Arena_SUB_0.Text: *: Bem-vindo to the monster arena, where today the rank-5 torneio will take place!
*: Bem-vindo to the monster arena, where today the rank-6 torneio will take place!
*: Bem-vindo to the monster arena, where today the rank-7 torneio will take place!
*: Now it's time for match 1 to begin. Could both teams please take their places?
*: Ready? Steady? FIGHT!
*: Fantástico! The challenger wins match número {VALUE} with a superb victory!
*: Next up is match número {VALUE}! Combatants, take your places!
*: At long last, the final battle of this monster arena torneio is upon us!
*: Both teams will surely bring their best to this fight...
*: Combatants, por favor, take your places!
*: This is it<--->the final battle in rank 5!
*: Ready? Steady? FIGHT!
*: Caramba! The challenger has been defeated!
*: {LEADER}'s team has been defeated in match número {VALUE} and fails to triumph in the rank-5 torneio!
*: The fight is over! The winner of the rank-5 torneio is none other than the challenger!
*: Victory in rank 5 earns the champion the right to compete in rank 6 next.
*: Por favor, put your hands together and say obrigado to all today's fighters!
*: That concludes today's monster arena torneio! Come back next time for another thrilling competition!
*: Fantástico! The challenger wins match número {VALUE} with a superb victory!
*: Next up is match número {VALUE}! Combatants, take your places!
*: At long last, the final battle of this torneio is upon us!
*: Both teams will surely bring their best to this fight...
*: Combatants, por favor, take your places!
*: This is it<--->the final battle in rank 6!
*: Ready? Steady? FIGHT!
*: Caramba! The challenger has been defeated!
*: {LEADER}'s team has been defeated in match número {VALUE} and fails to triumph in the rank-6 torneio!
*: The fight is over! The winner of the rank-6 torneio is none other than the challenger!
*: Victory in rank 6 earns the champion the right to compete in rank 7 next.
*: Por favor, put your hands together and say obrigado to all today's fighters!
*: That concludes today's torneio! Come back next time for another thrilling competition!
*: Fantástico! The challenger wins match número {VALUE} with a superb victory!
*: Next up is match número {VALUE}! Combatants, take your places!
*: At long last, the final battle of this torneio is upon us!
*: Both teams will surely bring their best to this fight...
*: Combatants, por favor, take your places!
*: This is it<--->the final battle in rank 7!
*: Ready? Steady? FIGHT!
*: Caramba! The challenger has been defeated!
*: {LEADER}'s team has been defeated in match número {VALUE} and fails to triumph in the rank-7 torneio!
*: The fight is over! The winner of the rank-7 torneio is none other than the challenger!
*: Victory in rank 7 earns the champion the right to compete in rank 8 next.
*: Por favor, put your hands together and say obrigado to all today's fighters!
*: That concludes today's torneio! Come back next time for another thrilling competition!
I will do my very best, so that I may make Papai proud!
Obrigado for fighting with me!
My papai always said that losing is a valuable experience too. I promise to come back even stronger!
Papai, I did it! I think I am strong enough to look after Mamai now.
